com_servlet.name: ORMS 손실
com_servlet.process:
ocu_brc
SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, S.GRP_ORGNM, A.LSHP_AMNNO, T.COMN_AMNNO_CNT, A.OCU_BRC, B.BRNM OCU_BRNM, A.RPRR_ENO, A.RPT_BRC, C.BRNM RPT_BRNM, A.BND_AMN_BRC, D.BRNM BND_AMN_BRNM, A.AMN_BRC, E.BRNM AMN_BRNM, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, A.OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, A.OCU_DT, A.DSCV_DT DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, P.FIR_ACG_PRC_DT, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') LSCHG_DT, A.HUR_AMNNO, NVL(A.OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM,0) OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, NVL(A.LSS_CST_AM,0) LSS_CST_AM, NVL(A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM,0) OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, NVL(A.LWS_CST_AM,0) LWS_CST_AM, NVL(A.LWS_WDR_AM,0) LWS_WDR_AM, NVL(A.ETC_CST_AM,0) ETC_CST_AM, NVL(A.OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM,0) OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, NVL(A.TTLS_AM,0) TOT_LSSAM, NVL((TTLS_AM-OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM),0) BF_ISR_WDR_GULS_AM, NVL(A.TOT_WDR_AM,0) TOT_WDR_AM, NVL(A.GULS_AM,0) GU_LSSAM, A.ISR_RQS_YN, A.CRRK_YN, A.MKRK_YN, A.LGRK_YN, A.STRK_YN, A.FMRK_YN, A.RWA_YN, A.LSHP_FORM_C, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_FORM_CNM, A.LSHP_STSC, L.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_STSCNM, N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, DECODE(N.RTN_YN,'Y','ORM반려',O.INTG_IDVD_CNM) LSHP_DCZ_STSCNM, A.LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, A.LSHP_REL_WRSNM, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM , A.LWS_CURT_NM, A.RWA_UNQ_NO, A.LWS_YN, A.LWSJDG_DSC, R2.INTG_IDVD_CNM LWSJDG_DSCNM, A.LWS_TMNT_YN, A.LWS_RZT_C, R.INTG_IDVD_CNM LWS_RZT_CNM, U.AMN_BRC MAX_AMN_BRC, V.CHRG_EMPNM RPRR_ENM, P.LST_ACG_PRC_DT, P.FIR_LSS_ACG_ACCC, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM, A.LWS_CURT_NM, N.RTN_YN FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RPT_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BND_AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL
AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC_ORM'
AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC_NML'
AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC_ADM'
AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC'
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT, MAX(ACG_PRC_DT) LST_ACG_PRC_DT, SUBSTR(MIN(ACG_PRC_DT||LSS_ACG_ACCC),9) FIR_LSS_ACG_ACCC FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) P ON A.GRP_ORG_C = P.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = P.LSHP_AMNNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LWS_RZT_C = R.IDVDC_VAL AND R.INTG_GRP_C = 'LWS_RZT_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE R2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LWSJDG_DSC = R2.IDVDC_VAL AND R2.INTG_GRP_C = 'LWSJDG_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG S ON A.GRP_ORG_C = S.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, COUNT(COMN_LSHP_AMNNO) COMN_AMNNO_CNT FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP
WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sch_grp_org_c#)
WHERE GRP_ORG_C IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO ORDER BY COMN_LSHP_AMNNO DESC ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO = T.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A
WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sch_grp_org_c#)
WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C IS NOT NULL
AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = A.GRP_ORG_C AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) U ON A.GRP_ORG_C = U.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = U.LSHP_AMNNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP V ON A.GRP_ORG_C = V.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(A.RPRR_ENO) = V.ENO
WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sch_grp_org_c#)
WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C IS NOT NULL
AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y'
AND A.LSHP_AMNNO LIKE '%%' || TRIM(#sch_lshp_amnno#) || '%%'
AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC IN ('04','05','06', '07','08')
AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC IN ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07','08')
AND A.OCU_DT >= #st_dt#
AND A.OCU_DT <= #ed_dt#
AND A.DSCV_DT >= #st_dt#
AND A.DSCV_DT <= #ed_dt#
AND TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') >= #st_dt#
AND TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') <= #ed_dt#
AND P.FIR_ACG_PRC_DT >= #st_dt#
AND P.FIR_ACG_PRC_DT <= #ed_dt#
AND TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') >= #st_dt#
AND TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') <= #ed_dt#
AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = #lshp_form_c#
AND A.RPT_BRC = #rpt_brc#
AND A.TTLS_AM >= #st_am#
AND A.TTLS_AM <= #ed_am#
AND A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM >= #st_am#
AND A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM <= #ed_am#
AND TOT_WDR_AM >= #st_am#
AND TOT_WDR_AM <= #ed_am#
AND GULS_AM >= #st_am#
AND GULS_AM <= #ed_am#
AND A.LSHP_STSC = #lshp_stsc#
AND A.AMN_BRC = #amn_brc#
AND A.OCU_BRC = #ocu_brc#
AND A.ISR_RQS_YN = #sch_isr_rqs_yn#
AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC IN ( #sch_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc# )
AND UPPER(A.LSS_TINM) LIKE '%%' || UPPER(TRIM(#sch_lshp_tinm#)) || '%%'
AND A.RWA_YN = 'Y'
AND (
A.CRRK_YN = 'Y'
OR
A.MKRK_YN = 'Y'
OR
A.LGRK_YN = 'Y'
OR
A.STRK_YN = 'Y'
OR
A.FMRK_YN = 'Y'
)
ORDER BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO DESC

sql.name: sql12
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#), NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO), 1)+1, TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#hd_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql13
sql.data:
INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#), NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO),1)+1, TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#hd_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), TRIM(#hd_rtn_yn#), NULL,
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql14
sql.data:
INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#), NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO),1)+1, TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#hd_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, TRIM(#rpsp_opi_cntn#),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql15
sql.data:
INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#), NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO),1)+1, NULL, TRIM(#userid#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#hd_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), TRIM(#hd_rtn_yn#), NULL,
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET DCZ_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(DCZ_SQNO) FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#) ) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OC_GLACC SET LSS_RG_STSC = NULL, LSS_RG_RQR_STSC = NULL, LSS_RG_RQR_DT = NULL, LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE (GRP_ORG_C, LSS_ACG_ACCC, BRC, SACCT_SQNO, RVPY_DSC, CRC_CAN_DSC, ACG_PRC_DT) IN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSS_ACG_ACCC, BRC, SACCT_SQNO, RVPY_DSC, CRC_CAN_DSC, ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#) AND VLD_YN = 'Y' AND GRP_ORG_C IS NOT NULL AND LSS_ACG_ACCC IS NOT NULL AND BRC IS NOT NULL AND SACCT_SQNO IS NOT NULL AND RVPY_DSC IS NOT NULL AND CRC_CAN_DSC IS NOT NULL AND ACG_PRC_DT IS NOT NULL)

sql.name: sql12
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LH_LSAM SET VLD_YN = 'N', VLD_ED_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql13
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql14
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET VLD_ED_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , VLD_YN = 'N' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data:
SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, S.GRP_ORGNM, A.LSHP_AMNNO, T.COMN_AMNNO_CNT, A.OCU_BRC, B.BRNM OCU_BRNM, A.RPRR_ENO, A.RPT_BRC, C.BRNM RPT_BRNM, A.BND_AMN_BRC, D.BRNM BND_AMN_BRNM, A.AMN_BRC, E.BRNM AMN_BRNM, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, A.OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, A.OCU_DT, A.DSCV_DT DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, P.FIR_ACG_PRC_DT, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') LSCHG_DT, A.HUR_AMNNO, NVL(A.OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM,0) OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, NVL(A.LSS_CST_AM,0) LSS_CST_AM, NVL(A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM,0) OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, NVL(A.LWS_CST_AM,0) LWS_CST_AM, NVL(A.LWS_WDR_AM,0) LWS_WDR_AM, NVL(A.ETC_CST_AM,0) ETC_CST_AM, NVL(A.OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM,0) OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, NVL(A.TTLS_AM,0) TOT_LSSAM, NVL((TTLS_AM-OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM),0) BF_ISR_WDR_GULS_AM, NVL(A.TOT_WDR_AM,0) TOT_WDR_AM, NVL(A.GULS_AM,0) GU_LSSAM, A.ISR_RQS_YN, A.CRRK_YN, A.MKRK_YN, A.LGRK_YN, A.STRK_YN, A.FMRK_YN, A.RWA_YN,
A.LSHP_FORM_C, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_FORM_CNM, A.LSHP_STSC, L.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_STSCNM, N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, O.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_DCZ_STSCNM, A.LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, A.LSHP_REL_WRSNM, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM , A.LWS_CURT_NM, A.LWS_YN, A.LWSJDG_DSC, R2.INTG_IDVD_CNM LWSJDG_DSCNM, A.LWS_TMNT_YN, A.LWS_RZT_C, R.INTG_IDVD_CNM LWS_RZT_CNM, U.AMN_BRC MAX_AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RPT_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BND_AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) P ON A.GRP_ORG_C = P.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = P.LSHP_AMNNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LWS_RZT_C = R.IDVDC_VAL AND R.INTG_GRP_C = 'LWS_RZT_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE R2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LWSJDG_DSC = R.IDVDC_VAL AND R.INTG_GRP_C = 'LWSJDG_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG S ON A.GRP_ORG_C = S.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, COUNT(COMN_LSHP_AMNNO) COMN_AMNNO_CNT FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO ORDER BY COMN_LSHP_AMNNO DESC ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO = T.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = A.GRP_ORG_C AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) U ON A.GRP_ORG_C = U.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = U.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' AND A.LSHP_AMNNO IN (#lshp_amnno#) ORDER BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO DESC

TRIM(#isr_rqs_yn#), 1, 1, TRIM(#lws_yn#), TRIM(#lwsjdg_dsc#), TRIM(#lws_tmnt_yn#), TRIM(#lws_rzt_c#), TRIM(#lws_hp_no#), TRIM(#lws_lg_am#), TRIM(#lws_curt_nm#), TRIM(#rwa_unq_no#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#max_amnno#)

DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') LSCHG_DT, A.HUR_AMNNO, A.LSHP_FORM_C, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_FORM_CNM, A.LSHP_STSC, L.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_STSCNM, A.AMN_BRC, E.BRNM AMN_BRNM, A.OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, A.MKRK_YN, A.CRRK_YN, A.RWA_YN, A.STRK_YN, A.LGRK_YN, A.FMRK_YN, A.LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, A.LSHP_REL_WRSNM, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, O.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_DCZ_STSCNM, A.LWS_YN, A.LWSJDG_DSC, A.LWS_TMNT_YN, A.LWS_RZT_C, A.ISR_RQS_YN, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM , A.LWS_CURT_NM , A.RWA_UNQ_NO, T.AMN_BRC MAX_AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RPT_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BND_AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ Q ON A.GRP_ORG_C = Q.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_RGN_C = Q.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(A.RPRR_ENO) = R.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = T.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno#

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSSAM_SQNO, ACC_DSC, A.SACCT_SQNO ACC_SQNO, A.LSS_ACG_ACCC, B.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSS_ACG_ACCNM, A.BRC ACC_BRC, A.CRC_CAN_DSC, A.ACG_PRC_DT, A.LSOC_AM, A.RVPY_DSC, C.INTG_IDVD_CNM RVPY_DSNM, A.TR_CNTN, A.RMK_CNTN, A.LWS_PRG_CNTN, A.LWS_HPN_NO, A.WDR_AM_RCP_DT, NULL TT_YN, A.VLD_ST_DT, A.VLD_ED_DT, A.VLD_YN, A.FIR_INP_DTM, A.FIR_INPMN_ENO, A.LSCHG_DTM, A.LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSS_ACG_ACCC = B.IDVDC_VAL AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSS_ACG_ACCC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RVPY_DSC = C.IDVDC_VAL AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'RVPY_DSC' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO IN ( #hd_lshp_amnno# ) AND A.ACC_DSC = '3' AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y'

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSSAM_SQNO, ACC_DSC, A.SACCT_SQNO ACC_SQNO, A.LSS_ACG_ACCC, B.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSS_ACG_ACCNM, A.BRC ACC_BRC, A.CRC_CAN_DSC, A.ACG_PRC_DT, A.LSOC_AM, A.RVPY_DSC, C.INTG_IDVD_CNM RVPY_DSNM, A.TR_CNTN, A.WDR_AM_RCP_DT, A.RMK_CNTN, NULL TT_YN, A.VLD_ST_DT, A.VLD_ED_DT, A.VLD_YN, A.FIR_INP_DTM, A.FIR_INPMN_ENO, A.LSCHG_DTM, A.LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSS_ACG_ACCC = B.IDVDC_VAL AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSS_ACG_ACCC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RVPY_DSC = C.IDVDC_VAL AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'RVPY_DSC' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO IN ( #hd_lshp_amnno# ) AND A.ACC_DSC = '4' AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y'

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.TRF_BRK_SQNO, A.BF_BRC, B.BRNM BF_BRNM, A.NOW_BRC, C.BRNM NOW_BRNM, A.RGMN_ENO, D.CHRG_EMPNM RGMN_ENM, A.TRFRG_DT, A.TRF_APVMN_ENO, E.CHRG_EMPNM TRF_APVMN_ENM, A.TRF_APV_DT, A.TRF_CNTN, A.FIR_INP_DTM, A.FIR_INPMN_ENO, A.LSCHG_DTM, A.LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BF_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NOW_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RGMN_ENO = D.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.TRF_APVMN_ENO = E.ENO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno# AND A.BF_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.TRF_APV_DT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.TRF_BRK_SQNO DESC

sql.name: sql11
sql.data:
SELECT * FROM ( WITH PRSS AS ( SELECT SUBSTR(PRSS, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,2) + 1, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,3) - INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,2) -1) PRSS1 , SUBSTR(PRSS, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,3) + 1, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,4) - INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,3) -1) PRSS2 , SUBSTR(PRSS, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,4) + 1, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,5) - INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,4) -1) PRSS3 , SUBSTR(PRSS, INSTR(PRSS,'|',1,5) + 1) PRSS4 , SUBSTR(PRSSNM, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,2) + 1, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,3) - INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,2) -1) PRSSNM1 , SUBSTR(PRSSNM, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,3) + 1, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,4) - INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,3) -1) PRSSNM2 , SUBSTR(PRSSNM, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,4) + 1, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,5) - INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,4) -1) PRSSNM3 , SUBSTR(PRSSNM, INSTR(PRSSNM,'|',1,5) + 1) PRSSNM4 , GRP_ORG_C FROM ( SELECT SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(BSN_PRSS_C,'|') AS PRSS , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(BSN_PRSNM,'|') AS PRSSNM , GRP_ORG_C FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS WHERE LVL_NO='4' AND VLD_YN='Y' START WITH UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR BSN_PRSS_C = UP_BSN_PRSS_C AND PRIOR GRP_ORG_C = GRP_ORG_C ) ) , DEPT_BRNM AS ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , B.UP_BRC , C.BRNM , B.BRC FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON B.UP_BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_RH_BRC D ON B.BRC = D.BRC AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = D.OPRK_RKP_ID
GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C,B.UP_BRC,C.BRNM,B.BRC )
SELECT B.GRP_ORG_C , B.BRC , A.OPRK_RKP_ID RKP_ID , CASE WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='01' THEN '전사' WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='03' THEN '영업점' WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='02' THEN C.BRNM END DEPT_BRNM , CASE WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='01' THEN '전사' WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='03' THEN '영업점' WHEN A.RKP_TPC ='02' THEN B.BRNM END BRNM , D.PRSSNM1 , D.PRSSNM2 , D.PRSSNM3 , D.PRSSNM4 , A.RK_ISC_CNTN , E.RK_CP_CNTN , TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DT , TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') CHG_DT FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A , TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B , DEPT_BRNM C , PRSS D , TB_OR_RH_CTL_SCF E , TB_OR_RH_REL_LSS F , TB_OR_RH_BRC G WHERE G.BRC = B.BRC AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = F.OPRK_RKP_ID AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = G.OPRK_RKP_ID AND C.BRC = B.BRC AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = E.OPRK_RKP_ID AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = D.PRSS4 AND F.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)
)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO),0)+1 DCZ_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data:
INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#lshp_amnno#), TRIM(#dcz_sqno#), TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, NULL,
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.name: sql12
sql.data:
INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#lshp_amnno#), TRIM(#dcz_sqno#), TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#s_lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, TRIM(#rasp_opi_cntn#),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET OCU_RGN_C = TRIM(#ocu_up_brc#) , HPN_OCU_NATCD = TRIM(#hpn_ocu_natcd#) , OCU_BRC = TRIM(#ocu_brc#) , RPRR_ENO = TRIM(#rprr_eno#) , TMP_RG_BRC = NULL , RPT_BRC = TRIM(#rpt_brc#) , BND_AMN_BRC = TRIM(#bnd_amn_brc#) , LSS_TINM = TRIM(#lshp_tinm#) , OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#ocu_dept_dtl_cntn#) , AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#amn_dept_dtl_cntn#) , OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#oprk_amn_dtl_cntn#) , OCU_DT = TRIM(#ocu_dt#) , DSCV_DT = TRIM(#dcv_dt#) , HUR_AMNNO = TRIM(#hur_amnno#) , LSHP_FORM_C = TRIM(#lshp_form_c#) , LSHP_STSC = TRIM(#lshp_stsc#) , AMN_BRC = TRIM(#amn_brc#) , OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM = TRIM(#ham_xpc_am#) , LSS_CST_AM = TRIM(#lss_cst_am#) , OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM = TRIM(#isr_wdr_am#) , LWS_CST_AM = TRIM(#lws_cst_am#) , LWS_WDR_AM = TRIM(#lws_wdr_am#) , ETC_CST_AM = TRIM(#etc_cst_am#) , OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM = TRIM(#etc_wdr_am#) , TTLS_AM = TRIM(#tot_lssam#) , TOT_WDR_AM = TRIM(#tot_wdr_am#) , GULS_AM = TRIM(#gu_lssam#) , MKRK_YN = TRIM(#mkrk_yn#) , CRRK_YN = TRIM(#crrk_yn#) , RWA_YN = TRIM(#rwa_yn#) , STRK_YN = TRIM(#strk_yn#) , LGRK_YN = TRIM(#lgrk_yn#) , FMRK_YN = TRIM(#fmrk_yn#) , LWS_HP_NO = TRIM(#lws_hp_no#) , LWS_LG_AM = TRIM(#lws_lg_am#) , LWS_CURT_NM = TRIM(#lws_curt_nm#) , LSOC_CHAN_CNTN = TRIM(#lsoc_chan_cntn#) , LSHP_REL_WRSNM = TRIM(#lshp_rel_wrsnm#) , ISR_RQS_YN = TRIM(#isr_rqs_yn#) , LWS_YN = TRIM(#lws_yn#) , LWSJDG_DSC = TRIM(#lwsjdg_dsc#) , LWS_TMNT_YN = TRIM(#lws_tmnt_yn#) , LWS_RZT_C = TRIM(#lws_rzt_c#) , DCZ_SQNO = TRIM(#dcz_sqno#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) , RWA_UNQ_NO = TRIM(#rwa_unq_no#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND lshp_amnno = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LH_LSAM SET LSOC_AM = TRIM(#lsoc_am#), TR_CNTN = TRIM(#tr_cntn#), HPN_RC_DT = TRIM(#hpn_rc_dt#), ACD_NO = TRIM(#acd_no#), LSS_ISR_KDC = TRIM(#ls_isr_kdc#), LWS_PRG_CNTN = TRIM(#lws_prg_cntn#), LWS_HPN_NO = TRIM(#lws_hpn_no#), WDR_AM_RCP_DT = TRIM(#wdr_am_rcp_dt#), RMK_CNTN = TRIM(#rmk_cntn#), LSS_ACG_ACCC = TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#), BRC = TRIM(#acc_brc#), SACCT_SQNO = TRIM(#acc_sqno#), RVPY_DSC = TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#), CRC_CAN_DSC = NVL(TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#),'0'), ACG_PRC_DT = TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#) AND LSSAM_SQNO = TRIM(#lssam_sqno#)

sql.name: sql12
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_LSAM( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, LSSAM_SQNO, ACC_DSC, LSOC_AM, TR_CNTN, HPN_RC_DT, ACD_NO, LSS_ISR_KDC, LWS_PRG_CNTN, LWS_HPN_NO, WDR_AM_RCP_DT, RMK_CNTN, LSS_ACG_ACCC, BRC, SACCT_SQNO, RVPY_DSC, CRC_CAN_DSC, ACG_PRC_DT, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#lshp_amnno#), NVL(MAX(LSSAM_SQNO),0)+1, TRIM(#acc_dsc#), TRIM(#lsoc_am#), TRIM(#tr_cntn#), TRIM(#hpn_rc_dt#), TRIM(#acd_no#), TRIM(#ls_isr_kdc#), TRIM(#lws_prg_cntn#), TRIM(#lws_hpn_no#), TRIM(#wdr_am_rcp_dt#), TRIM(#rmk_cntn#), TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#), TRIM(#acc_brc#), TRIM(#acc_sqno#), TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#), NVL(TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#),'0'), TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE GRP_ORG_C=TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO=TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql13
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LH_LSAM SET VLD_YN = 'N', VLD_ED_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#) AND LSSAM_SQNO = TRIM(#lssam_sqno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OC_GLACC SET LSS_RG_STSC = NULL, LSS_RG_RQR_STSC = NULL, LSS_RG_RQR_DT = NULL, X_RSNCTT = NULL, LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSS_ACG_ACCC = TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#) AND BRC = TRIM(#acc_brc#) AND SACCT_SQNO = TRIM(#acc_sqno#) AND RVPY_DSC = TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#) AND CRC_CAN_DSC = TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#) AND ACG_PRC_DT = TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.LSHP_AMNNO, B.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = B.DCZ_SQNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno#

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, #acc_dsc# ACC_DSC, A.LSS_ACG_ACCC, A.BRC, B.BRNM, A.SACCT_SQNO, A.RVPY_DSC, A.CRC_CAN_DSC, A.ACG_PRC_DT, A.ACC_SBJNM, A.ACC_AM, A.TR_CNTN, A.LSS_RG_STSC, A.LSS_RG_RQR_DT, A.X_RSNCTT FROM TB_OR_OC_GLACC A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSS_RG_STSC IS NULL

sql.name: sql11
sql.data:
SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, NULL OCU_COP_C, A.OCU_RGN_C, Q.BRNM OCU_UP_BRNM, A.OCU_BRC, B.BRNM OCU_BRNM, A.HPN_OCU_NATCD, A.RPRR_ENO, R.CHRG_EMPNM RPRR_ENM, R.PZCC RPRR_PZCNM, A.RPT_BRC, C.BRNM RPT_BRNM, A.BND_AMN_BRC, D.BRNM BND_AMN_BRNM, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, A.OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, A.OCU_DT, A.DSCV_DT DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') LSCHG_DT, A.HUR_AMNNO, A.LSHP_FORM_C, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_FORM_CNM, A.AMN_BRC, E.BRNM AMN_BRNM, A.OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, A.MKRK_YN, A.CRRK_YN, A.RWA_YN, A.STRK_YN, A.LGRK_YN, A.FMRK_YN, A.LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, A.LSHP_REL_WRSNM, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM , A.LWS_CURT_NM , A.RWA_UNQ_NO, N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, O.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_DCZ_STSCNM, A.LWS_YN, A.LWSJDG_DSC, A.LWS_TMNT_YN, A.LWS_RZT_C, A.ISR_RQS_YN, T.AMN_BRC MAX_AMN_BRC, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM, A.LWS_CURT_NM , A.RWA_UNQ_NO, A.LSS_CST_AM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RPT_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BND_AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ Q ON A.GRP_ORG_C = Q.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_RGN_C = Q.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(A.RPRR_ENO) = R.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = T.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno#

D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ Q ON A.GRP_ORG_C = Q.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_RGN_C = Q.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(A.RPRR_ENO) = R.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = T.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno#

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LM_LSHP( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, LWS_HP_NO, LWS_LG_AM, LWS_CURT_NM, RWA_UNQ_NO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES (TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#max_amnno#), TRIM(#max_amnno#), TRIM(#ocu_up_brc#), TRIM(#hpn_ocu_natcd#), TRIM(#ocu_brc#), TRIM(#rprr_eno#), NULL, TRIM(#rpt_brc#), TRIM(#bnd_amn_brc#), TRIM(#lshp_tinm#), TRIM(#ocu_dept_dtl_cntn#), TRIM(#amn_dept_dtl_cntn#), TRIM(#oprk_amn_dtl_cntn#), TRIM(#ocu_dt#), TRIM(#dcv_dt#), TRIM(#hur_amnno#), TRIM(#lshp_form_c#), TRIM(#lshp_stsc#), TRIM(#amn_brc#), TRIM(#ham_xpc_am#), TRIM(#lss_cst_am#), TRIM(#isr_wdr_am#), TRIM(#lws_cst_am#), TRIM(#lws_wdr_am#), TRIM(#etc_cst_am#), TRIM(#etc_wdr_am#), TRIM(#ttls_am#), TRIM(#tot_wdr_am#), TRIM(#guls_am#), TRIM(#mkrk_yn#), TRIM(#crrk_yn#), TRIM(#rwa_yn#), TRIM(#strk_yn#), TRIM(#fmrk_yn#), TRIM(#lgrk_yn#), TRIM(#lsoc_chan_cntn#), TRIM(#lshp_rel_wrsnm#), TRIM(#isr_rqs_yn#), 1, 1, TRIM(#lws_yn#), TRIM(#lwsjdg_dsc#), TRIM(#lws_tmnt_yn#), TRIM(#lws_rzt_c#), TRIM(#lws_hp_no#), TRIM(#lws_lg_am#), TRIM(#lws_curt_nm#), TRIM(#rwa_unq_no#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#max_amnno#), 1, TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#max_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_LSAM( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, LSSAM_SQNO, ACC_DSC, LSOC_AM, TR_CNTN, HPN_RC_DT, ACD_NO, LSS_ISR_KDC, LWS_PRG_CNTN, LWS_HPN_NO, WDR_AM_RCP_DT, RMK_CNTN, LSS_ACG_ACCC, BRC, SACCT_SQNO, RVPY_DSC, CRC_CAN_DSC, ACG_PRC_DT, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#max_amnno#), NVL(MAX(LSSAM_SQNO),0)+1, TRIM(#acc_dsc#), TRIM(#lsoc_am#), TRIM(#tr_cntn#), TRIM(#hpn_rc_dt#), TRIM(#acd_no#), TRIM(#ls_isr_kdc#), TRIM(#lws_prg_cntn#), TRIM(#lws_hpn_no#), TRIM(#wdr_am_rcp_dt#), TRIM(#rmk_cntn#), TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#), TRIM(#acc_brc#), TRIM(#acc_sqno#), TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#), NVL(TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#),'0'), TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE GRP_ORG_C=TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO=TRIM(#max_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OC_GLACC SET LSS_RG_STSC = '01', X_RSNCTT = NULL, LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSS_ACG_ACCC = TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#) AND BRC = TRIM(#acc_brc#) AND SACCT_SQNO = TRIM(#acc_sqno#) AND RVPY_DSC = TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#) AND CRC_CAN_DSC = TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#) AND ACG_PRC_DT = TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#)

sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET COMN_LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#max_amnno#), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, TRIM(#standard#), OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.TRF_BRK_SQNO, A.BF_BRC, B.BRNM BF_BRNM, A.NOW_BRC, C.BRNM NOW_BRNM, A.RGMN_ENO, D.CHRG_EMPNM RGMN_ENM, A.TRFRG_DT, A.TRF_APVMN_ENO, E.CHRG_EMPNM TRF_APVMN_ENM, A.TRF_APV_DT, A.TRF_CNTN, A.FIR_INP_DTM, A.FIR_INPMN_ENO, A.LSCHG_DTM, A.LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BF_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NOW_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RGMN_ENO = D.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.TRF_APVMN_ENO = E.ENO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno# AND A.BF_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.TRF_APV_DT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.TRF_BRK_SQNO DESC

RPT_BRNM, A.BND_AMN_BRC, D.BRNM BND_AMN_BRNM, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, A.OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, A.OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, A.OCU_DT, A.DSCV_DT DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') LSCHG_DT, A.HUR_AMNNO, A.LSHP_FORM_C, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_FORM_CNM, A.LSHP_STSC, L.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_STSCNM, A.AMN_BRC, E.BRNM AMN_BRNM, A.OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, A.MKRK_YN, A.CRRK_YN, A.RWA_YN, A.STRK_YN, A.LGRK_YN, A.FMRK_YN, A.LWS_HP_NO, A.LWS_LG_AM , A.LWS_CURT_NM, A.LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, A.LSHP_REL_WRSNM, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, O.INTG_IDVD_CNM LSHP_DCZ_STSCNM, A.LWS_YN, A.LWSJDG_DSC, A.LWS_TMNT_YN, A.LWS_RZT_C, T.AMN_BRC MAX_AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RPT_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BND_AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AMN_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_FORM_C = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_FORM_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE L ON A.GRP_ORG_C = L.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_STSC = L.IDVDC_VAL AND L.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_DCZ N ON A.GRP_ORG_C = N.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = N.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.DCZ_SQNO = N.DCZ_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE O ON A.GRP_ORG_C = O.GRP_ORG_C AND N.LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC = O.IDVDC_VAL AND O.INTG_GRP_C = 'LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ Q ON A.GRP_ORG_C = Q.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_RGN_C = Q.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP R ON A.GRP_ORG_C = R.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(A.RPRR_ENO) = R.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.AMN_BRC FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.AMN_BRC IS NOT NULL AND A.LSHP_SQNO = ( SELECT MAX(LSHP_SQNO)-1 FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND LSHP_AMNNO = A.LSHP_AMNNO ) ) T ON A.GRP_ORG_C = T.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = T.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = #lshp_amnno#

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.LSHP_AMNNO COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, B.OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN STANDARD_AMNNO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A INNER JOIN TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO INNER JOIN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) C ON B.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.LSHP_AMNNO = C.LSHP_AMNNO AND B.LSHP_SQNO = C.LSHP_SQNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO = #hd_lshp_amnno# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO != #hd_lshp_amnno#

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.FIR_INP_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DTM, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.OCU_BRC, B.BRNM, A.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = B.BRC AND B.UYN = 'Y' INNER JOIN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = C.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.LSHP_SQNO = C.LSHP_SQNO WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO = #hd_lshp_amnno# AND A.LSHP_AMNNO != #hd_lshp_amnno# AND A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO IS NOT NULL

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(MAX(DCZ_SQNO),0)+1 DCZ_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LH_DCZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_DCZ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, DCZ_SQNO, DCZ_RQRMN_ENO, DCZMN_ENO, DCZ_DT, LSHP_DCZ_STS_DSC, RTN_YN, RPSP_OPI_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#), TRIM(#dcz_sqno#), TRIM(#userid#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#lshp_dcz_sts_dsc#), NULL, TRIM(#rpsp_opi_cntn#), NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET OCU_RGN_C = TRIM(#ocu_up_brc#) , HPN_OCU_NATCD = TRIM(#hpn_ocu_natcd#) , OCU_BRC = TRIM(#ocu_brc#) , RPRR_ENO = TRIM(#rprr_eno#) , TMP_RG_BRC = NULL , RPT_BRC = TRIM(#rpt_brc#) , BND_AMN_BRC = TRIM(#bnd_amn_brc#) , LSS_TINM = TRIM(#lshp_tinm#) , OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#ocu_dept_dtl_cntn#) , AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#amn_dept_dtl_cntn#) , OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#oprk_amn_dtl_cntn#) , OCU_DT = TRIM(#ocu_dt#) , DSCV_DT = TRIM(#dcv_dt#) , HUR_AMNNO = TRIM(#hur_amnno#) , LSHP_FORM_C = TRIM(#lshp_form_c#) , LSHP_STSC = TRIM(#lshp_stsc#) , AMN_BRC = TRIM(#amn_brc#) , OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM = TRIM(#ham_xpc_am#) , LSS_CST_AM = TRIM(#lss_cst_am#) , OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM = TRIM(#isr_wdr_am#) , LWS_CST_AM = TRIM(#lws_cst_am#) , LWS_WDR_AM = TRIM(#lws_wdr_am#) , ETC_CST_AM = TRIM(#etc_cst_am#) , OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM = TRIM(#etc_wdr_am#) , TTLS_AM = TRIM(#tot_lssam#) , TOT_WDR_AM = TRIM(#tot_wdr_am#) , GULS_AM = TRIM(#gu_lssam#) , MKRK_YN = TRIM(#mkrk_yn#) , CRRK_YN = TRIM(#crrk_yn#) , RWA_YN = TRIM(#rwa_yn#) , STRK_YN = TRIM(#strk_yn#) , LGRK_YN = TRIM(#lgrk_yn#) , FMRK_YN = TRIM(#fmrk_yn#) , LSOC_CHAN_CNTN = TRIM(#lsoc_chan_cntn#) , LSHP_REL_WRSNM = TRIM(#lshp_rel_wrsnm#) , BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#bsn_prss_c#) , IFN_TPC = TRIM(#ifn_tpc#) , HPN_TPC = TRIM(#hpn_tpc#)
, EMRK_TPC = TRIM(#emrk_tpc#) , CAS_TPC = TRIM(#cas_tpc#) , ISR_RQS_YN = TRIM(#isr_rqs_yn#) , LWS_YN = TRIM(#lws_yn#) , LWSJDG_DSC = TRIM(#lwsjdg_dsc#) , LWS_TMNT_YN = TRIM(#lws_tmnt_yn#) , LWS_RZT_C = TRIM(#lws_rzt_c#) , LWS_HP_NO = TRIM(#lws_hp_no#) , LWS_LG_AM = TRIM(#lws_lg_am#) , LWS_CURT_NM = TRIM(#lws_curt_nm#) , DCZ_SQNO = TRIM(#dcz_sqno#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND lshp_amnno = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#comn_lshp_amnno#)

sql.data: SELECT DISTINCT C.BF_BRC, D.BRNM BF_BRNM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(TRF_BRK_SQNO) TRF_BRK_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_LH_TRF C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = C.LSHP_AMNNO AND B.TRF_BRK_SQNO = C.TRF_BRK_SQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BF_BRC = D.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND C.BF_BRC IS NOT NULL

sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, B.OCU_BRC, C.BRNM OCU_BRNM, B.RPT_BRC, D.BRNM RPT_BRNM, A.BF_BRC, E.BRNM BF_BRNM, B.OCU_DT, B.DSCV_DT DCV_DT, TO_CHAR(B.FIR_INP_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') FIR_INP_DT, A.TRFRG_DT, B.TTLS_AM, B.GULS_AM, B.LSS_TINM LSHP_TINM, B.LWS_YN LSS_YN, A.TRF_PRG_STSC, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM TRF_PRG_STSCNM, A.TRF_BRK_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF A INNER JOIN TB_OR_LM_LSHP B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.TRF_BRK_SQNO = B.TRF_BRK_SQNO AND B.LSHP_AMNNO = B.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO AND B.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON B.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.OCU_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON B.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND B.RPT_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON B.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BF_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.TRF_PRG_STSC = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'TRF_PRG_STSC'

CAS_TPC_LV1, H1.CAS_TPNM CAS_TPNM_LV1, B.HPN_TPC HPN_TPC_LV3, I3.HPN_TPNM HPN_TPNM_LV3, I2.HPN_TPC HPN_TPC_LV2, I2.HPN_TPNM HPN_TPNM_LV2, I1.HPN_TPC HPN_TPC_LV1, I1.HPN_TPNM HPN_TPNM_LV1, B.IFN_TPC IFN_TPC_LV2, J2.IFN_TPNM IFN_TPNM_LV2, J1.IFN_TPC IFN_TPC_LV1, J1.IFN_TPNM IFN_TPNM_LV1, B.LWS_YN LSS_YN, A.TRF_PRG_STSC, K.INTG_IDVD_CNM TRF_PRG_STSCNM, A.TRF_BRK_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF A INNER JOIN TB_OR_LM_LSHP B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO AND A.TRF_BRK_SQNO = B.TRF_BRK_SQNO AND B.LSHP_AMNNO = B.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO AND B.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON B.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.OCU_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON B.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND B.AMN_BRC = D.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON B.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BF_BRC = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F4 ON B.GRP_ORG_C = F4.GRP_ORG_C AND B.BSN_PRSS_C = F4.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F3 ON F4.GRP_ORG_C = F3.GRP_ORG_C AND F4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F3.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F2 ON F3.GRP_ORG_C = F2.GRP_ORG_C AND F3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F2.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS F1 ON F2.GRP_ORG_C = F1.GRP_ORG_C AND F2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = F1.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS H3 ON B.GRP_ORG_C = H3.GRP_ORG_C AND B.CAS_TPC = H3.CAS_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS H2 ON H3.GRP_ORG_C = H2.GRP_ORG_C AND H3.UP_CAS_TPC = H2.CAS_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS H1 ON H2.GRP_ORG_C = H1.GRP_ORG_C AND H2.UP_CAS_TPC = H1.CAS_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN I3 ON B.GRP_ORG_C = I3.GRP_ORG_C AND B.HPN_TPC = I3.HPN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN I2 ON I3.GRP_ORG_C = I2.GRP_ORG_C AND I3.UP_HPN_TPC = I2.HPN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN I1 ON I2.GRP_ORG_C = I1.GRP_ORG_C AND I2.UP_HPN_TPC = I1.HPN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN J2 ON B.GRP_ORG_C = J2.GRP_ORG_C AND B.IFN_TPC = J2.IFN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN J1 ON J2.GRP_ORG_C = J1.GRP_ORG_C AND J2.UP_IFN_TPC = J1.IFN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE K ON A.GRP_ORG_C = K.GRP_ORG_C AND A.TRF_PRG_STSC = K.IDVDC_VAL AND K.INTG_GRP_C = 'TRF_PRG_STSC'

sql.name: sql25
sql.data: ORDER BY A.LSHP_AMNNO DESC NULLS LAST, LSHP_AMNNO DESC

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_TRF ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, BF_BRC, NOW_BRC, RGMN_ENO, TRFRG_DT, TRF_APVMN_ENO, TRF_APV_DT, TRF_PRG_STSC, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#+1), BF_BRC, NOW_BRC, RGMN_ENO, TRFRG_DT, TRIM(#userid#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), '01', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#) AND TRF_BRK_SQNO = TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET RPT_BRC = TRIM(#sch_amn_brc#), TRF_BRK_SQNO = TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#+1), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#userid#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LH_TRF ( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, BF_BRC, NOW_BRC, RGMN_ENO, TRFRG_DT, TRF_APVMN_ENO, TRF_APV_DT, TRF_PRG_STSC, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#+1), BF_BRC, NOW_BRC, TRIM(#userid#), TRFRG_DT, TRF_APVMN_ENO, TRF_APV_DT, '03', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) FROM TB_OR_LH_TRF WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#) AND TRF_BRK_SQNO = TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#-1)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_LSHP SET TRF_BRK_SQNO = TRIM(#trf_brk_sqno#+1), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST( GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, LSHP_SQNO, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.LSHP_AMNNO, A.COMN_LSHP_AMNNO, NVL(B.LSHP_SQNO,0)+1, OCU_RGN_C, HPN_OCU_NATCD, OCU_BRC, RPRR_ENO, TMP_RG_BRC, RPT_BRC, BND_AMN_BRC, LSS_TINM, OCU_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, AMN_DEPT_DTL_CNTN, OPRK_AMN_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, HUR_AMNNO, LSHP_FORM_C, LSHP_STSC, AMN_BRC, OPRK_HAM_XPC_AM, LSS_CST_AM, OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM, LWS_CST_AM, LWS_WDR_AM, ETC_CST_AM, OPRK_ETC_WDR_AM, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, MKRK_YN, CRRK_YN, RWA_YN, STRK_YN, FMRK_YN, LGRK_YN, LSOC_CHAN_CNTN, LSHP_REL_WRSNM, BSN_PRSS_C, IFN_TPC, HPN_TPC, CAS_TPC, ISR_RQS_YN, LWS_YN, LWSJDG_DSC, LWS_TMNT_YN, LWS_RZT_C, DCZ_SQNO, TRF_BRK_SQNO, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A, (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MAX(LSHP_SQNO) AS LSHP_SQNO FROM TB_OR_LN_LSHP_HST GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = B.LSHP_AMNNO(+) AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_ORGNM, A.BRNM, A.HPN_TPNM TPNM, A.LOSS_CNT, A.SUM_TTLS_AM, A.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, A.SUM_ISR_BF_AM, A.SUM_GULS_AM, NVL(B.LOSS_CNT_TF,0) LOSS_CNT_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TTLS_AM_TF,0) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF,0) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF,0) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_GULS_AM_TF,0) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.HPN_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HPN_TPC = B3.HPN_TPC AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_HPN_TPC = B2.HPN_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_HPN_TPC = B1.HPN_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = D.BRC AND D.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = E.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.HPN_TPC IS NOT NULL

sql.name: sql12
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_ORGNM, A.BRNM, A.CAS_TPNM TPNM, A.LOSS_CNT, A.SUM_TTLS_AM, A.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, A.SUM_ISR_BF_AM, A.SUM_GULS_AM, NVL(B.LOSS_CNT_TF,0) LOSS_CNT_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TTLS_AM_TF,0) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF,0) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF,0) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_GULS_AM_TF,0) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.CAS_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.CAS_TPC = B3.CAS_TPC AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_CAS_TPC = B2.CAS_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_CAS_TPC = B1.CAS_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = D.BRC AND D.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = E.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAS_TPC IS NOT NULL

sql.name: sql13
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_ORGNM, A.BRNM, A.IFN_TPNM TPNM, A.LOSS_CNT, A.SUM_TTLS_AM, A.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, A.SUM_ISR_BF_AM, A.SUM_GULS_AM, NVL(B.LOSS_CNT_TF,0) LOSS_CNT_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TTLS_AM_TF,0) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF,0) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF,0) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_GULS_AM_TF,0) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.IFN_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM-A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.IFN_TPC = B2.IFN_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_IFN_TPC = B1.IFN_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = D.BRC AND D.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = E.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.IFN_TPC IS NOT NULL

sql.name: sql14
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_ORGNM, A.BRNM, A.BSN_PRSNM TPNM, A.LOSS_CNT, A.SUM_TTLS_AM, A.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, A.SUM_ISR_BF_AM, A.SUM_GULS_AM, NVL(B.LOSS_CNT_TF,0) LOSS_CNT_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TTLS_AM_TF,0) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF,0) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF,0) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, NVL(B.SUM_GULS_AM_TF,0) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.BSN_PRSNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM-A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = D.BRC AND D.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = E.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.BSN_PRSS_C IS NOT NULL

sql.name: sql37
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.HPN_TPNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, HPN_TPNM ) A, (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.HPN_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT_TF, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HPN_TPC = B3.HPN_TPC AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_HPN_TPC = B2.HPN_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_HPN_TPC = B1.HPN_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = D.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.HPN_TPC IS NOT NULL AND A.TTLS_AM >= 25000000

sql.name: sql38
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.CAS_TPNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, CAS_TPNM ) A, (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.CAS_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT_TF, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM+A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.CAS_TPC = B3.CAS_TPC AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_CAS_TPC = B2.CAS_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_CAS_TPC = B1.CAS_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = D.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAS_TPC IS NOT NULL AND A.TTLS_AM >= 25000000

sql.name: sql39
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.IFN_TPNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, IFN_TPNM ) A, (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.IFN_TPNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT_TF, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM-A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.IFN_TPC = B2.IFN_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_IFN_TPC = B1.IFN_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = D.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.IFN_TPC IS NOT NULL AND A.TTLS_AM >= 25000000

sql.name: sql40
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.GRP_ORGNM, D.BRNM, B1.BSN_PRSNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, BSN_PRSNM ) A, (SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.BSN_PRSNM, COUNT(A.LSHP_AMNNO) LOSS_CNT_TF, SUM(A.TTLS_AM) SUM_TTLS_AM_TF, SUM(A.TOT_WDR_AM) SUM_TOT_WDR_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM-A.OPRK_ISR_WDR_AM) SUM_ISR_BF_AM_TF, SUM(A.GULS_AM) SUM_GULS_AM_TF FROM TB_OR_LM_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B4.BSN_PRSS_C AND B4.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B3 ON B4.GRP_ORG_C = B3.GRP_ORG_C AND B4.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B3.BSN_PRSS_C AND B3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B2 ON B3.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND B3.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B2.BSN_PRSS_C AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_PRSS B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = B1.BSN_PRSS_C AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OCU_BRC = C.BRC AND C.UYN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO, MIN(ACG_PRC_DT) FIR_ACG_PRC_DT FROM TB_OR_LH_LSAM WHERE VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, LSHP_AMNNO ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LSHP_AMNNO = D.LSHP_AMNNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.BSN_PRSS_C IS NOT NULL AND A.TTLS_AM >= 25000000

sql.name: sql63
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.HPN_TPNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, HPN_TPNM ) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.HPN_TPNM = B.HPN_TPNM(+) AND A.BRNM = B.BRNM(+)

sql.name: sql64

sql.name: sql65
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.IFN_TPNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, IFN_TPNM ) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.BRNM = B.BRNM(+) AND A.IFN_TPNM = B.IFN_TPNM(+)

sql.name: sql66
sql.data: GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, C.BRNM, B1.BSN_PRSNM ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, BRNM, BSN_PRSNM ) B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C(+) AND A.BRNM = B.BRNM(+) AND A.BSN_PRSNM = B.BSN_PRSNM(+)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.OUT_LSHP_AMNNO, B.INTG_IDVD_CNM COL_METNM, A.HPN_OCU_ORGNM, A.LSS_TINM, A.SNT_ACT_DT, A.OCU_DT, A.DSCV_DT, A.INPDT, A.TTLS_AM, A.TOT_WDR_AM, A.GULS_AM, C2.IFN_TPNM, D2.HPN_TPNM, E2.CAS_TPNM, A.RKP_HLD_YN, A.OPRK_RKP_ID, A.ORG_SNT_OBJ_YN, A.DRTR_SNT_OBJ_YN, A.EMP_SNT_OBJ_YN FROM TB_OR_LM_OUT_LSHP A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.COL_METHC = B.IDVDC_VAL AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'COL_METHC' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN C2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.IFN_TPC = C2.IFN_TPC AND C2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN C1 ON C2.GRP_ORG_C = C1.GRP_ORG_C AND C2.UP_IFN_TPC = C1.IFN_TPC AND C1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN D3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HPN_TPC = D3.HPN_TPC AND D3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN D2 ON D3.GRP_ORG_C = D2.GRP_ORG_C AND D3.UP_HPN_TPC = D2.HPN_TPC AND D2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN D1 ON D2.GRP_ORG_C = D1.GRP_ORG_C AND D2.UP_HPN_TPC = D1.HPN_TPC AND D1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS E3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.CAS_TPC = E3.CAS_TPC AND E3.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS E2 ON E3.GRP_ORG_C = E2.GRP_ORG_C AND E3.UP_CAS_TPC = E2.CAS_TPC AND E2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS E1 ON E2.GRP_ORG_C = E1.GRP_ORG_C AND E2.UP_CAS_TPC = E1.CAS_TPC AND E1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_RM_RKP F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = F.OPRK_RKP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y'

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_LM_OUT_LSHP SET COL_METHC = TRIM(#st_col_methc#), ETC_OUT_RMK_CNTN = TRIM(#etc_out_rmk_cntn#), HPN_OCU_ORGNM = TRIM(#hpn_ocu_orgnm#), LSS_TINM = TRIM(#lss_tinm#), LSS_DTL_CNTN = TRIM(#lss_dtl_cntn#), ORG_SNT_OBJ_YN = TRIM(#st_org_snt_obj_yn#), DRTR_SNT_OBJ_YN = TRIM(#st_drtr_snt_obj_yn#), EMP_SNT_OBJ_YN = TRIM(#st_emp_snt_obj_yn#), SNT_CNTN = TRIM(#snt_cntn#), SNT_ACT_DT = TRIM(REPLACE(#snt_act_dt#, '-', '')), OCU_DT = TRIM(REPLACE(#ocu_dt#, '-', '')), DSCV_DT = TRIM(REPLACE(#dscv_dt#, '-', '')), CAS_TPC = TRIM(#hd_cas_tpc#), HPN_TPC = TRIM(#hd_hpn_tpc#), IFN_TPC = TRIM(#hd_ifn_tpc#), TTLS_AM = TRIM(#ttls_am#), RMK_CNTN = TRIM(#rmk_cntn#), TOT_WDR_AM = TRIM(#tot_wdr_am#), GULS_AM = TRIM(#guls_am#), RKP_HLD_YN = TRIM(#st_rkp_hld_yn#), OPRK_RKP_ID = TRIM(#sch_rkp_id#), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND OUT_LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#out_lshp_amnno#)

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_LM_OUT_LSHP ( GRP_ORG_C, OUT_LSHP_AMNNO, CAS_TPC, HPN_OCU_ORGNM, COL_METHC, LSS_TINM, LSS_DTL_CNTN, OCU_DT, DSCV_DT, INPDT, HPN_TPC, IFN_TPC, TTLS_AM, TOT_WDR_AM, GULS_AM, RMK_CNTN, RKP_HLD_YN, OPRK_RKP_ID, ORG_SNT_OBJ_YN, DRTR_SNT_OBJ_YN, EMP_SNT_OBJ_YN, SNT_CNTN, SNT_ACT_DT, ETC_OUT_RMK_CNTN, VLD_ST_DT, VLD_ED_DT, VLD_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#out_lshp_amnno#), TRIM(#hd_cas_tpc#), TRIM(#hpn_ocu_orgnm#), TRIM(#st_col_methc#), TRIM(#lss_tinm#), TRIM(#lss_dtl_cntn#), TRIM(REPLACE(#ocu_dt#, '-', '')), TRIM(REPLACE(#dscv_dt#, '-', '')), TRIM(REPLACE(#inpdt#, '-', '')), TRIM(#hd_hpn_tpc#), TRIM(#hd_ifn_tpc#), TRIM(#ttls_am#), TRIM(#tot_wdr_am#), TRIM(#guls_am#), TRIM(#rmk_cntn#), TRIM(#st_rkp_hld_yn#), TRIM(#sch_rkp_id#), TRIM(#st_org_snt_obj_yn#), TRIM(#st_drtr_snt_obj_yn#), TRIM(#st_emp_snt_obj_yn#), TRIM(#snt_cntn#), TRIM(REPLACE(#snt_act_dt#, '-', '')), TRIM(#etc_out_rmk_cntn#), TRIM(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')), '99991231', 'Y', SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: SELECT A.COL_METHC, A.ETC_OUT_RMK_CNTN, A.HPN_OCU_ORGNM, A.OUT_LSHP_AMNNO, A.LSS_TINM, A.LSS_DTL_CNTN, A.ORG_SNT_OBJ_YN, A.DRTR_SNT_OBJ_YN, A.EMP_SNT_OBJ_YN, A.SNT_CNTN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SNT_ACT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') SNT_ACT_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCU_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') OCU_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DSCV_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') DSCV_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INPDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') INPDT, A.TTLS_AM, A.TOT_WDR_AM, A.GULS_AM, A.RMK_CNTN, A.IFN_TPC, B1.IFN_TPNM IFN_TPNM_LV1, B2.IFN_TPNM, A.HPN_TPC, C1.HPN_TPNM HPN_TPNM_LV1, C2.HPN_TPNM, A.CAS_TPC, D1.CAS_TPNM CAS_TPNM_LV1, D2.CAS_TPNM, A.RKP_HLD_YN, A.OPRK_RKP_ID, E.RK_ISC_CNTN FROM TB_OR_LM_OUT_LSHP A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.IFN_TPC = B2.IFN_TPC AND B2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_IFN B1 ON B2.GRP_ORG_C = B1.GRP_ORG_C AND B2.UP_IFN_TPC = B1.IFN_TPC AND B1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN C2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HPN_TPC = C2.HPN_TPC AND C2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_HPN C1 ON C2.GRP_ORG_C = C1.GRP_ORG_C AND C2.UP_HPN_TPC = C1.HPN_TPC AND C1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS D2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.CAS_TPC = D2.CAS_TPC AND D2.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OC_CAS D1 ON D2.GRP_ORG_C = D1.GRP_ORG_C AND D2.UP_CAS_TPC = D1.CAS_TPC AND D1.VLD_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_OR_RM_RKP E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = E.OPRK_RKP_ID WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.OUT_LSHP_AMNNO = TRIM(#hd_out_lshp_amnno#)

sql.data: WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C IS NOT NULL AND B.UYN = 'Y'

sql.name: sql11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OC_GLACC SET LSS_RG_STSC = '02', X_RSNCTT = TRIM(#x_rsnctt#), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND LSS_ACG_ACCC = TRIM(#lss_acg_accc#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#) AND TR_SQNO = TRIM(#tr_sqno#) AND SACCT_SQNO = TRIM(#acc_sqno#) AND RVPY_DSC = TRIM(#rvpy_dsc#) AND CRC_CAN_DSC = TRIM(#crc_can_dsc#) AND ACG_PRC_DT = TRIM(#acg_prc_dt#)
